metadata.title: Rose Quartz Roller and Gua Sha Facial Tool, Jade Roller for Face, Wrinkles, Eye Puffiness, Anti Aging. Face Massager. Durable, Natural Noiseless.
features: ✅ GREATLY IMPROVED! Good Bye broken frame, popped rollers or squeaky noises! Hello new jade roller! Same great benefits delivered smoothly, quietly and worry free! The new metal frame is a one-piece design, no welding. The holding arms have rounded ends and silicone inserts that prevent squeaking and ensure a smooth rolling. This is an authentic natural, real and pure rose quartz face roller. Perfect Christmas gift for her and him!

✅ FACE ROLLER - COOL LITTLE TOOL! Each end has a gemstone roller; even the handle of can be used for massage. With its slimming and depuffing properties this detox tool is a must have. Cool it in the fridge for an extra oomph – ice roller! Use it every morning for long lasting benefits - it takes no more than few minutes to look your best! Besides the facial massage the rose quartz roller can help serums better absorb into skin. Jade rollers for face were used in the Traditional Chinese Medicine

✅ GUA SHA SCRAPER! Just like the face rollers, the Gua Sha facial tool has originated from TCM. The crystal contour is hand-carved specially for the face but it can also be used on the body. Use the rounded edges and a long scraping motion to relieve tension, boost blood circulation and encourage lymphatic drainage or for a neck lift. Depending on pressure, edge, speed and direction, you can either lift and de-puff, work on surface lines and smooth or relieve deep muscular tension.

✅ THE SET: The Rose Quartz Roller, Gua Sha Scraper and pouch kit come in a beautiful gift box, perfect for birthday, anniversary or other occasions. The roller and scraper are small enough to be portable; the pouch will hold them both. The Rose Quarts roller and Gua Sha scraper are sturdy but please be careful. Don't drop them on hard surfaces (the crystal will crack). Do not clean them with chemicals or hot water. Don't leave them in the sun.
✅ OUR PROMISE: We use top quality materials and craftsmanship, and responsible manufacturing. We stand behind our products and offer 100% WARRANTY AND MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!
description: Benefits:

The lovely Rose Quartz, with its gentle pink essence, is a stone of the heart. It carries a soft feminine energy of compassion, peace, tenderness, healing, so its use in your beauty routines is so appropriate. Since the 7th century in Ancient China, facial jade rollers have been used in beauty rituals. They are said to help reduce puffiness, drain the lymphatic system, increase blood circulation, all the while connecting you with the loving energy of the Rose Quartz. The roller also works on improving your skin complexion, it can help remove scars, clear up the skin, reduce wrinkles, and give you that soft, glowing complexion. The Rose Quartz is the stone of Love - Love your Skin
- Be You, Be Beautiful!
